person.persName: John Parker (Jackson County, Kentucky, merchant, postmaster and justice of the peace)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, merchant, postmaster and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Parker. Father of Jason W. Parker, Louisa Parker, and John Parker, Jr. Merchant in Jackson County in 1860. Postmaster for Mauldin, Kentucky, from March 1860 to September 1863. Justice of the peace in Jackson County in 1864 and 1865.
